subject: Add version tracking diff view and cost estimation helper
body:
Implements the remaining usage scenario priorities:

Priority 4 - Save & Iterate:
- Added diff-view.js: Shows what changed between two saved options
- Displays input changes, setting changes, and result impact
- Visual badges for added/removed/changed fields
- "What Changed?" button in comparison manager (requires 2 selections)

Priority 6 - Cost Estimation Helper:
- Added cost-estimator.js: Hours Ã— rate calculator
- Phase breakdown (Discovery, Design, Development, Testing, Deployment)
- Contingency percentage calculation
- "Use Estimate" button populates calculator inputs
- Link added to input form section

Updated USAGE_SCENARIOS_REVIEW.md:
- All 6 priorities now marked as implemented
- Updated workflow step ratings to reflect current state
- Added implementation summary with file locations
